description: This file defines the main React component for a web scraper frontend, responsible for rendering the app interface, handling user input, and managing the scraper's state.

methods.name: App()
methods.description: Main React functional component that manages the layout, input handling, and display logic for the web scraper app.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Async function invoked upon form submission to perform URL scraping and update the component's state based on success or failure.
